title: Bugs with bans

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: My friend completed the ban and the group disbanded when there were 30 seconds left. Don't really think it's a bug, but it's something that's annoying and frustrating, considering his afk was because of a dc too.

replies.body: Prob a bug, but there may of also just been some lag in there too
